ingredients.ingredient: 1 pound chicken livers, rinsed and trimmed
1 ½ cups Burgundy or other dry red wine
¼ cup chopped pitted green olives

gear.name: Large Dutch oven or heavy skillet

cookingTips: Render bacon fat first; it becomes the cooking base for livers
Remove livers from pan once cooked to prevent overcooking while building sauce
Let wine reduce by half to concentrate flavors and mellow the acidity
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user balance rich bacon and wine flavors while keeping chicken livers tender and not gamey.
